replies.body: Up 1 if you think there should be a dingo warwick skin {{champion:19}}
Still Haven't got my Hextech Chest Riot pls help {{item:3070}}

From what I can see, you did receive the chest and key early last night! I can see that you opened a chest shortly (minutes) after you got the key+chest, so there might be some confusion as the numbers could have not updated on your interface during the time before you used it.
What about the 20 points that I earned?? I thought that was the chest I got {{summoner:31}}
The 20 point chest+key is given out at the very end of Ocean Week!
Did you contribute more then 4 points before the end of the hextech battle? If you didn't you won't get hextech chest and key.
I've contributed over 20 points but still haven't received my Hextech Chest and key. Do I receive this after ocean week or..?
The hex chest and key is awarded after the event is over, if you've achieved 20+ points.
The 20 point chest is awarded after the event is over, but the 4 point and 10 point chests are awarded within 24 hours of the end of their respective battles.
you have to play games and to get points you have to win those games for 2 points you have to play on the bonus map during the week like rift/aram/twisted treeline glhf{{item:3069}}
i have a question how will you announce the winners and when
On the same weekend as the Auckland 9's {{champion:32}}
